com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk.data_model.node

Interface Node


  • public interface Node
    Represents a device in Bluetooth Mesh. Nodes can be assigned to Subnets and Groups. In order to get a Node, a Connectable Device must be provisioned.

    • Method Summary
